Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

Class RegistryNetByteBuf

java.lang.Object
io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf
net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf
com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetByteBuf
com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.RegistryNetByteBuf
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetBuf<NetByteBuf>, io.netty.buffer.ByteBufConvertible, io.netty.util.ReferenceCounted, Comparable<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf>, net.neoforged.neoforge.common.extensions.IFriendlyByteBufExtension
public class RegistryNetByteBuf extends NetByteBuf
A NetByteBuf bound to a particular RegistryAccess instance. This buffer is like a NetRegistryByteBuf except it extends NetByteBuf instead of RegistryFriendlyByteBuf.

Class hierarchy: 

               FriendlyByteBuf
                 /         \
   RegistryFriendlyByteBuf      NetByteBuf
              |               |
 NetRegistryByteBuf<->RegistryNetByteBuf
See Also:
  • NetByteBuf
  • NetRegistryByteBuf

      Parameters:
      wrapped - the buffer that this buffer wraps.

    • RegistryNetByteBuf

      Creates a new RegistryNetByteBuf, with passthrough optionally enabled.
      Parameters:
      wrapped - the buffer that this buffer wraps.
      passthrough - whether to disable optimizations.
      registryManager - the registry manager to attach.
